card.name: Carrier Pigeons
card.property: Flying When Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birds know no borders! Why, then, should we?" —General Varchild, in a missive to King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Carrier Pigeons
card.property: Flying When Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's true I ask no fealty of the flocks—but surely we are more than mere beasts." —King Darien of Kjeldor, in a missive to General Varchild

card.name: Errand of Duty
card.property: Create a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Call every able sword to our side. Kjeldor will stand triumphant!" —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Errand of Duty
card.property: Create a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "May they speed to their task, for the Skyknights alone cannot hold Kjeldor safe." —Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

card.name: Exile
card.property: Exile target nonwhite attacking creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Inheritance
card.property: Whenever a creature dies, you may pay {3}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More than lessons may be gained from the past." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Ivory Gargoyle
card.property: Flying When Ivory Gargoyle dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step and you skip your next draw step. {4}{W}: Exile Ivory Gargoyle.

card.name: Juniper Order Advocate
card.property: As long as Juniper Order Advocate is untapped, green creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In these troubled times, we alone carry the hope of reconciliation between Elf and Human." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

card.name: Kjeldoran Escort
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We willingly trade with Kjeldor, but the peace we build must come from both our lands." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Kjeldoran Escort
card.property: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The first caravan has passed safely through the Karplusan Mountains without incident, forging a trade route to Balduvia. Kjeld himself would never have believed it" —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Kjeldoran Home Guard
card.property: At end of combat, if Kjeldoran Home Guard attacked or blocked this combat, put a -0/-1 counter on Kjeldoran Home Guard and create a 0/1 white Deserter creature token.

card.name: Kjeldoran Pride
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2. {2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

card.name: Kjeldoran Pride
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2. {2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

card.name: Martyrdom
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Martyrs are cheaper than mercenaries, and a far better investment." —General Varchild

card.name: Martyrdom
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only true immortality is in dying for a cause." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Noble Steeds
card.property: {1} {W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only an animal born in the wild has sufficient heart to be a true Knight's steed." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Noble Steeds
card.property: {1} {W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They are fighters as fine as any Knight they carry." —Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

card.name: Reinforcements
card.property: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We aided the Balduvians once before. They need but ask and we shall do so again." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Reinforcements
card.property: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let them send their legions! I will show them that my truth is stronger than their swords." —General Varchild

card.name: Reprisal
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Reprisal
card.property: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Kjeldor's borders are secure, and its citizens are prepared to take up arms in defense of their families." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Royal Decree
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Whenever a Swamp, Mountain, black permanent, or red permanent becomes tapped, Royal Decree deals 1 damage to that permanent's controller.

card.name: Royal Herbalist
card.property: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Just as an Herbalist heals a wound, so must we heal the rift between Balduvia and Kjeldor." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Royal Herbalist
card.property: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's not so easy anymore. Nothing grows in Kjeldor but seaweed." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Scars of the Veteran
card.property: You may exile a white card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Prevent the next 7 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn. If it's a creature, put a +0/+1 counter on it for each 1 damage prevented this way at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Seasoned Tactician
card.property: {3}, Exile the top four cards of your library: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The benefits of peace far outweigh the pride of Generals." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Sustaining Spirit
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faith is our greatest protector." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Sworn Defender
card.property: {1}: Sworn Defender's power becomes the toughness of target creature blocking or being blocked by Sworn Defender minus 1 until end of turn, and Sworn Defender's toughness becomes 1 plus the power of that creature until end of turn.

card.name: Unlikely Alliance
card.property: {1} {W}: Target nonattacking, nonblocking creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strange alliances are alliances still, and provide the same protection." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Wild Aesthir
card.property: Flying, first strike {W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "High in the Karplusans, death is swift and razor-clawed." —Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

card.name: Wild Aesthir
card.property: Flying, first strike {W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What Barbarian secrets do they spy from their lofty perch?" —General Varchild

card.name: Arcane Denial
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Arcane Denial
card.property: Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Awesome Presence
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature they control that's blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At the core of all power is raw passion."Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Awesome Presence
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature they control that's blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I shape my weapons from the fears of my enemies." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

card.name: Benthic Explorers
card.property: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

card.name: Benthic Explorers
card.property: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Distant Atlantis charged these Explorers with the task of venturing into unknown waters to track the despised Viscerids.

card.name: Browse

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once great literature—now great litter."—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Diminishing Returns
card.property: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You exile the top ten cards of your library. Then each player draws up to seven cards.

card.name: False Demise
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Far too many of our missing 'dead' seem to be turning up in Varchild's ranks!" —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: False Demise
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fool! Never believe they're dead until you see the body!" —General Varchild

card.name: Force of Will
card.property: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

card.name: Foresight
card.property: Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle your library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Foresight
card.property: Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle your library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
card.property: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Lat-Nam has bequeathed us its secrets. With them we shall attain true enlightenment." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
card.property: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All the knowledge of Lat-Nam could not protect its sages from the Brothers' War." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Library of Lat-Nam
card.property: An opponent chooses one — • You draw three cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. • You search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Phantasmal Sphere
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Phantasmal Sphere, then sacrifice Phantasmal Sphere unless you pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on it. When Phantasmal Sphere leaves the battlefield, target opponent creates an X/X blue Orb creature token with flying, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Phantasmal Sphere.

card.name: Soldevi Heretic
card.property: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the arms of tragedy, there is little comfort in being right." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Soldevi Heretic
card.property: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It cannot be! Soldev crushed, and my machines to blame?" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Soldevi Sage
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Soldevi Sage
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our underground archives grow daily, as our excavators and sages alike dig to uncover hidden wonders." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Spiny Starfish
card.property: {U}: Regenerate Spiny Starfish. At the beginning of each end step, if Spiny Starfish regenerated this turn, create a 0/1 blue Starfish creature token for each time it regenerated this turn.

card.name: Storm Crow
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It tells you that the worst is coming. Do you listen?"—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Storm Crow
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Watch for it! Right on its tailfeathers will be a storm from your nightmares." —Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

card.name: Storm Elemental
card.property: Flying {U}, Exile the top card of your library: Tap target creature with flying. {U}, Exile the top card of your library: If the exiled card is a snow land, Storm Elemental gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Suffocation
card.property: Cast this spell only if you were dealt damage this turn by a red instant or sorcery spell. Suffocation deals 4 damage to the controller of the last red instant or sorcery spell that dealt damage to you this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Thought Lash
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Exile the top card of your library. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When a player doesn't pay Thought Lash's cumulative upkeep, that player exiles all cards from their library. Exile the top card of your library: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you this turn.

card.name: Tidal Control
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {2} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Pay 2 life or {2}: Counter target red or green spell. Any player may activate this ability.

card.name: Viscerid Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {1}{U}: Return Viscerid Armor to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fallen Viscerid's only tribute is to be worn by a comrade.

card.name: Viscerid Armor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {1}{U}: Return Viscerid Armor to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One Viscerid's death is often another's gain.

card.name: Viscerid Drone
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a Swamp: Destroy target nonartifact creature. It can't be regenerated. {T}, Sacrifice a creature and a snow Swamp: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all of Terisiare's flooding was natural . . . .

card.name: Balduvian Dead
card.property: {2} {R}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 3/1 black and red Graveborn creature token with haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Casting of Bones
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whether whole or not, still we serve Lim-Dûl's wishes." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

card.name: Casting of Bones
card.property: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a necromancer would create such a foul form of divination." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Contagion
card.property: You may pay 1 life and exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Distribute two -2/-1 counters among one or two target creatures.

card.name: Diseased Vermin
card.property: Whenever Diseased Vermin deals combat damage to a player, put an infection counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, Diseased Vermin deals X damage to target opponent previously dealt damage by it, where X is the number of infection counters on it.

card.name: Dystopia
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a green or white permanent.

card.name: Fatal Lore
card.property: An opponent chooses one — • You draw three cards. • You destroy up to two target creatures that player controls. They can't be regenerated. That player draws up to three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All knowledge has its price." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Feast or Famine
card.property: Choose one — • Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. • Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are not yet free of Lim-Dûl's terrors." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Feast or Famine
card.property: Choose one — • Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. • Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The living cannot understand the benefits of death." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

card.name: Fevered Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The burst of strength brought on by this plague should not be mistaken for a sign of renewed health." —Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

card.name: Fevered Strength
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fever clouds the mind as it energizes the body. Both will pass in time." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Insidious Bookworms
card.property: When Insidious Bookworms dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

card.name: Insidious Bookworms
card.property: When Insidious Bookworms dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

card.name: Keeper of Tresserhorn
card.property: Whenever Keeper of Tresserhorn attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage this turn and defending player loses 2 life.

card.name: Krovikan Horror
card.property: At the beginning of the end step, if Krovikan Horror is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may return Krovikan Horror to your hand. {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Krovikan Horror deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Krovikan Plague
card.property: Enchant non-Wall creature you control When Krovikan Plague enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Tap enchanted creature: Krovikan Plague deals 1 damage to any target. Put a -0/-1 counter on enchanted creature. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is untapped.

card.name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
card.property: First strike {1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Guard will forever stand ready. For them, death is merely an inconvenience, not an ending." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

card.name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
card.property: First strike {1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death does not prevent us from service to our absent master. As long as Tresserhorn stands, so shall we." —Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

card.name: Misinformation
card.property: Put up to three target cards from an opponent's graveyard on top of their library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you cannot rely on your sources, trust your own senses. When you cannot trust those, you must follow your instincts." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Phantasmal Fiend
card.property: {B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Phantasmal Fiend
card.property: {B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

card.name: Phyrexian Boon
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Phyrexian Boon
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dagsson should have paid attention to the lessons of Phyrexia before attempting to create a mechanical utopia." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Ritual of the Machine
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Gain control of target nonartifact, nonblack creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rumors persist of dark deeds performed in the depths of Soldev. When will Dagsson heed the danger therein?"—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Soldevi Adnate
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "People love to follow fools; they don't feel so alone then." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Soldevi Adnate
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An idiot cannot hear sense, even when a thousand people speak it." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Stench of Decay
card.property: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Disa is dead, and I am left. I shall allow no others to succumb to this pestilence." —Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

card.name: Stench of Decay
card.property: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My lord, there is only so much I can do. This plague infests Krov worse than any other city." —Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

card.name: Stromgald Spy
card.property: Whenever Stromgald Spy attacks and isn't blocked, you may have defending player play with their hand revealed for as long as Stromgald Spy remains on the battlefield. If you do, Stromgald Spy assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Swamp Mosquito
card.property: Flying Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Swamp Mosquito
card.property: Flying Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Agent of Stromgald
card.property: {R}: Add {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Order of Stromgald spreads its poisonous lies from within Varchild's troops, and still she sees only visions of conquest." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Agent of Stromgald
card.property: {R}: Add {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The 'fabled' Order of Stromgald is cast to the four winds, lost for all time. I, for one, give them no thought." —General Varchild

card.name: Balduvian Horde
card.property: When Balduvian Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace will come only when we have taken Varchild's head." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Balduvian War-Makers
card.property: Haste Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those mewling Barbarians will cower before my righteous steel!" —General Varchild

card.name: Balduvian War-Makers
card.property: Haste Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We send our best to battle, but every man, woman, and child will stand against Varchild's butchers." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Bestial Fury
card.property: Enchant creature When Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Bestial Fury
card.property: Enchant creature When Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Burnout
card.property: Counter target instant spell if it's blue. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Chaos Harlequin
card.property: {R}: Exile the top card of your library. If that card is a land card, Chaos Harlequin gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Otherwise, Chaos Harlequin gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Death Spark
card.property: Death Spark deals 1 damage to any target. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Death Spark is in your graveyard with a creature card directly above it, you may pay {1}. If you do, return Death Spark to your hand.

card.name: Enslaved Scout
card.property: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her soldiers' hatred for the Goblins is tempered only by their need for what the Goblins alone hold: knowledge of their mountain home." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Enslaved Scout
card.property: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the basest creatures may serve a purpose. Still, their lives need be only as long as the paths we tread." —General Varchild

card.name: Gorilla Shaman

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Frankly, destruction is best left to professionals." —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Gorilla Shaman

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Each generation teaches the next that artifice is the enemy of natural order." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Gorilla War Cry
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared. All creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The only 'art' these beasts possess is the art of noise!" —Jaya Ballard

card.name: Gorilla War Cry
card.property: Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared. All creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Theirs is the art of blood." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

card.name: Guerrilla Tactics
card.property: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Guerrilla Tactics
card.property: Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Omen of Fire
card.property: Return all Islands to their owners' hands. Each player sacrifices a Plains or a white permanent for each white permanent they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let Balduvia burn to warm Kjeldor's hearth!" —General Varchild

card.name: Pillage
card.property: Destroy target artifact or land. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Were they to reduce us to ash, we would clog their throats and sting their eyes in payment." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Primitive Justice
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{R} and/or {1}{G} any number of times. Destroy target artifact. For each additional {1}{R} you paid, destroy another target artifact. For each additional {1}{G} you paid, destroy another target artifact, and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Pyrokinesis
card.property: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Anybody want some . . . toast?" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Rogue Skycaptain
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wage counter on Rogue Skycaptain. You may pay {2} for each wage counter on it. If you don't, remove all wage counters from Rogue Skycaptain and an opponent gains control of it.

card.name: Soldier of Fortune
card.property: {R}, {T}: Target player shuffles their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Loyalty to coin alone is loyalty nonetheless." —General Varchild

card.name: Storm Shaman
card.property: {R}: Storm Shaman gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the lightning be your warning, and the thunder your battle cry." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Storm Shaman
card.property: {R}: Storm Shaman gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Embrace the storm. Its voice shall echo within you, and its fire shall become your touch" —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Varchild's Crusader
card.property: {0}: Varchild's Crusader can't be blocked this turn except by Walls. Sacrifice Varchild's Crusader at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We could have peace, but Varchild would rather have the maps of the new Kjeldor drawn in Balduvian blood." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Varchild's Crusader
card.property: {0}: Varchild's Crusader can't be blocked this turn except by Walls. Sacrifice Varchild's Crusader at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every patch of land must belong to Kjeldor, no matter what the cost!" —General Varchild

card.name: Varchild's War-Riders
card.property: Cumulative upkeep—Have an opponent create a 1/1 red Survivor creature token. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) Trample; rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What tries to crush our spirit only strengthens our resolve." —Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

card.name: Veteran's Voice
card.property: Enchant creature you control Tap enchanted creature: Target creature other than the creature tapped this way gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is untapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Good soldiers rely first upon their training, then upon their instincts." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Veteran's Voice
card.property: Enchant creature you control Tap enchanted creature: Target creature other than the creature tapped this way gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is untapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Teach by example. If your students do not survive, they were not worth the lesson." —General Varchild

card.name: Bounty of the Hunt
card.property: You may exile a green card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures. For each +1/+1 counter you put on a creature this way, remove a +1/+1 counter from that creature at the beginning of the next cleanup step.

card.name: Deadly Insect
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beautiful, indeed—but one sting could fell a Giant in a heartbeat." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Deadly Insect
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no time for pain when this beast leaves its terrible sting." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

card.name: Elvish Bard
card.property: All creatures able to block Elvish Bard do so.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one may fault an Elvish Ranger's heart, but the simplest frailty may fell even the proudest warrior." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How can any Human hope to match our skills? We are children of Fyndhorn, and its sap runs in our veins." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Elvish Spirit Guide
card.property: Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are never without guidance, if we but seek it." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Fyndhorn Druid
card.property: When Fyndhorn Druid dies, if it was blocked this turn, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All struggles ultimately require sacrifice. It's just that some sacrifices are dearer than others." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

card.name: Fyndhorn Druid
card.property: When Fyndhorn Druid dies, if it was blocked this turn, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Honor those who honor Fyndhorn above themselves." —Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

card.name: Gargantuan Gorilla
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a Forest. If you sacrifice a snow Forest this way, Gargantuan Gorilla gains trample until end of turn. If you don't sacrifice a Forest, sacrifice Gargantuan Gorilla and it deals 7 damage to you. {T}: Gargantuan Gorilla deals damage equal to its power to another target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Gargantuan Gorilla.

card.name: Gift of the Woods
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Gift of the Woods
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Gorilla Berserkers
card.property: Trample; rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.) Gorilla Berserkers can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Their fury is their greatest weapon." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Gorilla Berserkers
card.property: Trample; rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.) Gorilla Berserkers can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beneath serenity may lie a hidden rage." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

card.name: Gorilla Chieftain
card.property: {1} {G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.

card.name: Gorilla Chieftain
card.property: {1} {G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the soil of leadership sprout the seeds of immortality."—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Hail Storm
card.property: Hail Storm deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and 1 damage to you and each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If they can't take the hail, they'd better stay home." —Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

card.name: Kaysa
card.property: Green creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kaysa speaks as the Elder Druid, but the Yavimaya recognizes only one voice: its own.

card.name: Nature's Chosen
card.property: Enchant creature you control {0}: Untap enchanted creature. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn. Tap enchanted creature: Untap target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only if enchanted creature is white and is untapped and only once each turn.

card.name: Nature's Wrath
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Nature's Wrath unless you pay {G}. Whenever a player puts an Island or blue permanent onto the battlefield, that player sacrifices an Island or blue permanent. Whenever a player puts a Swamp or black permanent onto the battlefield, that player sacrifices a Swamp or black permanent.

card.name: Splintering Wind
card.property: {2} {G}: Splintering Wind deals 1 damage to target creature. Create a 1/1 green Splinter creature token. It has flying and "Cumulative upkeep {G}." When it leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and each creature you control. (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless they pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

card.name: Taste of Paradise
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{G} any number of times. You gain 3 life plus an additional 3 life for each additional {1}{G} you paid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any who drink of Freyalise's bounty drink the mead of rebirth." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Taste of Paradise
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{G} any number of times. You gain 3 life plus an additional 3 life for each additional {1}{G} you paid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is, in each of us, the potential to heal and the gift of renewed life." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Tornado
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) {2}{G}, Pay 3 life for each velocity counter on Tornado: Destroy target permanent and put a velocity counter on Tornado. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Undergrowth
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2}{R}. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If this spell's additional cost was paid, this effect doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is the work of sorcery. Burn it!" —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Undergrowth
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2}{R}. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If this spell's additional cost was paid, this effect doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The art of war is turning obstacle to advantage." —Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

card.name: Whip Vine
card.property: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) You may choose not to untap Whip Vine during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature with flying blocked by Whip Vine. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Whip Vine remains tapped.

card.name: Whip Vine
card.property: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) You may choose not to untap Whip Vine during your untap step. {T}: Tap target creature with flying blocked by Whip Vine. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Whip Vine remains tapped.

card.name: Yavimaya Ancients
card.property: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancients teach us that if we can but last, we shall prevail." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Yavimaya Ancients
card.property: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We orphans of Fyndhorn have found no welcome in this alien place." —Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

card.name: Yavimaya Ants
card.property: Trample, haste Cumulative upkeep {G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Few natural forces are as devastating as hunger." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Energy Arc
card.property: Untap any number of target creatures. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by those creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Relent, and you may transcend your situation." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Lim-Dûl's Vault
card.property: Look at the top five cards of your library. As many times as you choose, you may pay 1 life, put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order, then look at the top five cards of your library. Then shuffle your library and put the last cards you looked at this way on top of it in any order.

card.name: Lim-Dûl's Paladin
card.property: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, you may discard a card. If you don't, sacrifice Lim-Dûl's Paladin and draw a card. Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin becomes blocked, it gets +6/+3 until end of turn. Whenever Lim-Dûl's Paladin attacks and isn't blocked, it assigns no combat damage this turn and defending player loses 4 life.

card.name: Surge of Strength
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a red or green card. Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.

card.name: Nature's Blessing
card.property: {G} {W}, Discard a card: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or that creature gains banding, first strike, or trample. (This effect lasts indefinitely. Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding a player controls are blocking or being blocked by a creature, that player divides that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be open to the blessings, whatever their form." —Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

card.name: Wandering Mage
card.property: {W}, Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. {U}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target Cleric or Wizard creature this turn. {B}, Put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target player or planeswalker this turn.

card.name: Lord of Tresserhorn
card.property: When Lord of Tresserhorn enters the battlefield, you lose 2 life, you sacrifice two creatures, and target opponent draws two cards. {B}: Regenerate Lord of Tresserhorn.

card.name: Misfortune
card.property: An opponent chooses one — • You put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and gain 4 life. • You put a -1/-1 counter on each creature that player controls and Misfortune deals 4 damage to that player.

card.name: Winter's Night
card.property: Whenever a player taps a snow land for mana, that player adds one mana of any type that land produced. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Phelddagrif
card.property: {G}: Phelddagrif gains trample until end of turn. Target opponent creates a 1/1 green Hippo creature token. {W}: Phelddagrif gains flying until end of turn. Target opponent gains 2 life. {U}: Return Phelddagrif to its owner's hand. Target opponent may draw a card.

card.name: Aesthir Glider
card.property: Flying Aesthir Glider can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sacrilege! A noble ally in life, made nothing more than a glorified kite in death!" —Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

card.name: Aesthir Glider
card.property: Flying Aesthir Glider can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A fine example of the rewards of artifice: a thoroughly obedient steed with wings of Soldevi steel." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Ashnod's Cylix
card.property: {3}, {T}: Target player looks at the top three cards of their library, puts one of them back on top of their library, then exiles the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few remember that Ashnod's defilement of Terisiare's resources outstripped even that of her peers.

card.name: Astrolabe
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Astrolabe
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Floodwater Dam

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Viscerid dams may be of living creatures as well as bones and mud.

card.name: Gustha's Scepter
card.property: {T}: Exile a card from your hand face down. You may look at it for as long as it remains exiled. {T}: Return a card you own exiled with Gustha's Scepter to your hand. When you lose control of Gustha's Scepter, put all cards exiled with Gustha's Scepter into their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Helm of Obedience
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target opponent puts cards from the top of their library into their graveyard until a creature card or X cards are put into that graveyard this way, whichever comes first. If a creature card is put into that graveyard this way, sacrifice Helm of Obedience and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. X can't be 0.

card.name: Lodestone Bauble
card.property: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Lodestone Bauble: Put up to four target basic land cards from a player's graveyard on top of their library in any order. That player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Mishra's Groundbreaker
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Mishra's Groundbreaker: Target land becomes a 3/3 artifact creature that's still a land. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The very ground yielded to Mishra's wishes.

card.name: Mystic Compass
card.property: {1}, {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "And *I* say north is where I *want* it to be!" —Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

card.name: Phyrexian Devourer
card.property: When Phyrexian Devourer's power is 7 or greater, sacrifice it. Exile the top card of your library: Put X +1/+1 counters on Phyrexian Devourer, where X is the exiled card's converted mana cost.

card.name: Phyrexian Portal
card.property: {3}: If your library has ten or more cards in it, target opponent looks at the top ten cards of your library and separates them into two face-down piles. Exile one of those piles. Search the other pile for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle the rest of that pile into your library.

card.name: Phyrexian War Beast
card.property: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Deal with the spawn of Phyrexia cautiously; only with time may we control them." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Phyrexian War Beast
card.property: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Knowing its origins, how could they have thought they could control it?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Scarab of the Unseen
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Scarab of the Unseen: Return all Auras attached to target permanent you own to their owners' hands. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Shield Sphere
card.property: Defender Whenever Shield Sphere blocks, put a -0/-1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My Soldiers know that they need never fear for their protection." —King Darien of Kjeldor

card.name: Sol Grail
card.property: As Sol Grail enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look deep into the Grail, and see there what you desire most." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

card.name: Soldevi Digger
card.property: {2}: Put the top card of your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This ceaseless device has helped uncover marvels unreachable by mere flesh." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Soldevi Sentry
card.property: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A dreadful invention. What ease is there under the watchful eye of cold steel?" —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Soldevi Sentry
card.property: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our newfound security enables us to turn more of our attentions to the wonders that lie deep within the soil." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Soldevi Steam Beast
card.property: Whenever Soldevi Steam Beast becomes tapped, target opponent gains 2 life. {2}: Regenerate Soldevi Steam Beast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dagsson saw the steam as life-giving—until his followers felt its scalding touch." —Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

card.name: Soldevi Steam Beast
card.property: Whenever Soldevi Steam Beast becomes tapped, target opponent gains 2 life. {2}: Regenerate Soldevi Steam Beast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing has ever broken my heart so much as this—the betrayal of Soldev by my beloved machines!" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

card.name: Storm Cauldron
card.property: Each player may play an additional land during each of their turns. Whenever a land is tapped for mana, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Urza's Engine
card.property: Trample {3}: Urza's Engine gains banding until end of turn. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.) {3}: Attacking creatures banded with Urza's Engine gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Humans and machines working together can be fearsome indeed!" —Arcum Dagsson

card.name: Whirling Catapult
card.property: {2}, Exile the top two cards of your library: Whirling Catapult deals 1 damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Direct confrontation never was to the Orcs' taste." —General Varchild

card.name: Balduvian Trading Post
card.property: If Balduvian Trading Post would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Mountain instead. If you do, put Balduvian Trading Post onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {C}{R}. {1}, {T}: Balduvian Trading Post deals 1 damage to target attacking creature.

card.name: Heart of Yavimaya
card.property: If Heart of Yavimaya would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Forest instead. If you do, put Heart of Yavimaya onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Kjeldoran Outpost
card.property: If Kjeldoran Outpost would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Plains instead. If you do, put Kjeldoran Outpost onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {W}. {1}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

card.name: Lake of the Dead
card.property: If Lake of the Dead would enter the battlefield, sacrifice a Swamp instead. If you do, put Lake of the Dead onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {B}. {T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.

card.name: School of the Unseen
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the terrible retribution visited upon Lat-Nam, this school of mages chose to hide from the eyes of the world.

card.name: Sheltered Valley
card.property: If Sheltered Valley would enter the battlefield, instead sacrifice each other permanent named Sheltered Valley you control, then put Sheltered Valley onto the battlefield. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or fewer lands, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Soldevi Excavations
card.property: If Soldevi Excavations would enter the battlefield, sacrifice an untapped Island instead. If you do, put Soldevi Excavations onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. {T}: Add {C}{U}. {1}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Thawing Glaciers
card.property: Thawing Glaciers enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. Return Thawing Glaciers to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next cleanup step.
